title: List of Igbo people
header: President of Universal Television , a subsidiary of NBCUniversal Television Group , first woman of African descent to head a major U.S. television studio
data: Media mogul , founder of Nigerian-based African newspaper THISDAY , African -focused style & culture magazine Arise and Lagos-based Nigerian 24-hour international news channel Arise News
Nigerian businessman ; founder of Zenith Bank
Business mogul and father of Chukwuemeka Ojukwu , the former governor of the Eastern Region and leader of Biafra
Merchant queen of the River Niger
Nigerian businesswoman , publisher , fashion designer and the Managing Director/CEO of St. Eve Concepts
section_title: Heads of organizations and business executives
intro: The list of Igbo people includes notable individuals who have full or significant ancestry traced back to the Igbo people of South-East and South-South geopolitical regions of Nigeria. This page also contains names of people who traced their African heritage through DNA testing to the Igbo ethnic group.
